code: import React from'react';import'./Entry.css';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{getSocket}from'./socket';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Entry(){const navigate=useNavigate();const[userName,setUserName]=useState("");const enterUser=()=>{if(userName.trim()){const socket=getSocket();socket.emit("userName",userName);navigate('/Create_Join_Table');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"body_block",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"left-image",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"/images/left_image.png",alt:"Left Image",class:"image"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"right-image",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"/images/right_image.png",alt:"Right Image",class:"image"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"player_profile_block",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{class:"avatar-selector",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{class:"avatar-button",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"/images/avatar.png",alt:"Player Avatar",class:"avatar-image"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"player_name",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",id:"player_name",placeholder:"Enter your name",value:userName,onChange:e=>{setUserName(e.target.value);}})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{class:"enter_button_class",onClick:enterUser,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"/images/enter_button.png",alt:"Enter Button",class:"enter_button"})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"credit_block",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("text",{id:"credit",children:"Credit-"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("text",{id:"ojjas",children:"Ojjas"})]})]});}export default Entry;
